name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software engineering, specializing in performance optimization and scalability of high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Demonstrated expertise in data visualization, runtime profiling, and cloud monitoring. Proficient in leveraging **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for both frontend and backend development with technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Adept at building AI/ML-powered platforms that harness predictive analytics and real-time processing, while implementing cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**. Experienced in utilizing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines to streamline collaboration and enhance communication across teams.

Knowledgeable in compliance-driven development practices, ensuring adherence to HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, encompassing model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
